mapper.update: update userdetails set idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phonenum = #{phonenum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shortnum = #{shortnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, urgentnum = #{urgentnum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birthplace = #{birthplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, political = #{political,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nation = #{nation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where users_username = #{usersUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select users_username, idcard, phonenum, shortnum, email, qq, urgentnum, birthplace, address, political, nation, remark from userdetails where users_username = #{usersUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select users_username, idcard, phonenum, shortnum, email, qq, urgentnum, birthplace, address, political, nation, remark from userdetails
